attributes.comment: Dear CMS,A directory of healthcare providers that does not indicate the genetic or biological sex of the provider is for all practical purposes useless to the patient.A patient must have the complete and total right to have a provider they feel comfortable with otherwise the patient might not provide the healthcare provider accurate health information or just avoid seeking healthcare  at all. The comfort and health and care for and of the patient should be the priority of the CMS.The promotion of any kind ideology is a barrior to effective healthcare.Please include a way for the patient to access accurate information about the sex of the person who will be their healthcare provider.ty.

attributes.title: Comment on CMS-2022-0163-0001
